title: ""Dynamo"" Platinum and Higher are welcome to join ( Dynamic Ranked Q club and ranked 5 v 5 Teams )
body:
Hello to be Club members

My name is Crusader and i play competitive Solo q with my brothers and friends. I want to build a club where we can build and learn off each other while playing league together, i know everyone in league wants to hit challenger one day and I'm trying my best to do so .But sometimes i have no one to play with when friends and family needs to do there IRL needs and we all know we don't want to Solo Q with randoms :P.  This club is going to be built for players who want to make friends and become the best league player they can be!! :). 

On telecom platforms i do not own a vent channel i only use Skype for Communication only if someone joins and has a vent channel which they would like to share it would be awesome for this to be Club. 

Hope i have influence you enough to join this to be awesome ranked club :)!!!.

Leave a Comment if you are liking to talk or join :)

replies.body: Throw me an invite in game if this had gotten off the ground. IGN: LiveOnEvil

Regarding the vent/skype situation, I recommend Discord. Very easy to organise a server, have multiple channels and it has chat included. Not as intensive as skype and a little more aesthetically pleasing than vent.
